data.eml:eml: Two new species of Prionocyphon Redtenbacher from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scirtidae), with notes on Prionocyphon, Mescirtes Motschulsky and Prionoscirtes Champion from East and Southeast Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruta, Rafał (2010): Two new species of Prionocyphon Redtenbacher from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Scirtidae), with notes on Prionocyphon, Mescirtes Motschulsky and Prionoscirtes Champion from East and Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 2402: 52-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194102
